name: the bob deluxe
description:
the bob deluxe is a compilation of:
-bob goes to the store
-bob goes to the pineapple store
-bob gets blammed
-a new never before seen game, bob goes to prison

all of my bob goes to the _____ games in the past have been newgrounds "exclusives." unfortunately they have all been blammed so  i figured i would compile them and upload them here.

also, fun fact: bob goes to the pineapple store actually takes place before bob goes to the store
